name: Slow Cooker French Onion Pork Chops
author: Hannah
summary: A lighter version of a wonderful main dish. Easy to prepare and add some quick sides to. Yummy!
ingredients: 1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
1 (10.5 ounce) can French onion soup (such as Progresso®)
directions: Spray a skillet with cooking spray and heat over medium-high heat
Quickly brown pork chops in the skillet, seasoning with garlic salt, 5 to 7 minutes total
Transfer to a slow cooker and pour French onion soup on top
Cover and cook on Low for 8 hours
Remove the chops and keep warm
Add sour cream and flour to the slow cooker, mix well, and warm until slightly thickened, 10 to 15 minutes
